pr_title: feature: support server start with springboot and config with application.yaml

timeline.message: make server to support srpingboot and config with application.yaml
feature: create a new module with name server-starter for support springboot
bind git user.name to github account
bugfix:resolve code conflict with server-boot and develop
fix #3009 delete no use config file
fix #3009 add health check api for server-starter
fix #3009 add statement for new file
feature #3009: remove server-starter module and server module support springboot
feature #3009: add a  doc for build package

timeline.author: a364176773
